definition: to keep up appearances/to put up a front
to support/to prop up/to push or move with a pole/to maintain/to open or unfurl/to fill to bursting point/brace/stay/support
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
variant of 場|场[chang2]
variant of 場|场[chang3]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
variant of 麵|面[mian4]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Luckily the strength of the piece did not depend upon him.
sentences.chinese: 幸好这出戏并不靠他来撑场面。

sentences.english: He put those hardbacks on the shelves just for show; he never read them.
sentences.chinese: 他书架上那些精装书不过是为了撑场面，从来没看过。

definition: to keep up appearances/to put up a front
to serve as a stopgap/to make up a shortfall in the number of people
(coll.) gathering place/public venue
to cheer on (originally esp. as paid stooge)/to root for sb/to sing sb's praises/to flatter
to show deference to sb by obliging them (or by obliging sb associated with them)
see 裝點門面|装点门面[zhuang1 dian3 men2 mian4]
to manage to suppress/to keep under control
to enhance by contrast/to set off/to serve as a background in order to bring out the subject with greater brilliance/to serve as a prop/a foil
lit. to decorate the front of one's store (idiom)/fig. to embellish (one's CV, etc)/to keep up appearances/to put up a front
not presentable/shoddy and too embarrassing to show
to steal the show/to grab the limelight
to help/to assist financially
to do (sb) proud/to be a credit to (one's school etc)/to make oneself look good/to build up one's image
to save the show (for instance by stepping in for an absent actor)
to buy soy sauce/it's none of my business ("I’m just here to buy some soy sauce")
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5
